post:
Hi Lowendtalk,

ServersNV is glad to present a few offers.  This offer is out of Rapidswitch Maidenhead UK:

![Alt text](http://www.serversnv.com/images/up/banner.png)

**Datacenter:** RapidSwitch [UK]  
**WHOIS:** http://who.godaddy.com/whoisstd.aspx?domain=serversnv.com&prog_id=GoDaddy  
**VPS Technologies:** KVM & OVZ  

**Servers Info**
> E3-1230 CPU's
32 DDR3 ECC RAM
RAID 10 Enterprise SAS Drives
Raid Controller with BBU
Backup Space in separate Data Centre
All Servers are UK based with Gigabit Uplinks

**OpenVZ 512MB VPS**
>4 x vCPU Cores  
512 MB Ram  
512 MB vSWAP  
60 GB HDD Space (Hardware Raid 10)  
900 GB Bandwidth @ 1gbit  
1 x IPv4  
5 x IPv6  

Price 1.5€/month
Order Link: [LINK]( https://www.serversnv.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=22&promocode=FC1&currency=5)  
**Promo code= FC1**  

**OpenVZ 1GB VPS**
>4 x vCPU Cores  
1024 MB Ram  
1024 MB vSWAP  
120 GB HDD Space (Hardware Raid 10)  
1500 GB Bandwidth @ 1gbit  
1 x IPv4  
5 x IPv6  

Price 3€/month
Order Link: [LINK]( https://www.serversnv.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=4&promocode=FC4&currency=5)  
**Promo code= FC4**  

**KVM 512 MB VPS**
>4 x vCPU Cores  
512 MB Ram  
25 GB HDD Space (Hardware Raid 10)  
900 GB Bandwidth @ 1gbit  
1 x IPv4  
5 x IPv6  

Price 2€/month
Order Link: [LINK]( https://www.serversnv.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=2&promocode=FC3&currency=5)  
**Promo code= FC3**  


**Test IPv4:**  
http://lg.serversnv.com  
http://lg2.serversnv.com   

OFFER NOTES: - This is available for new orders only current customers cannot move on to this package however current customers can order it as an additional package if you want to do that.

While windows if offered free please note that attempting to install Windows on limited RAM may cause your VPS to blue screen, so is not suitable for anything under 768MB for 2008 Standard edition

HUGE selection of Linux ISO's and auto install templates plus option to upload custom ISO’s and Custom Plans, Windows 2008 & 2012 available (Windows 2008R2/2012R2 license is not included (180 day fully unrestricted trial).

UK Based Servers – Payments: PayPal | English & Spanish Support | [TOS] (https://www.serversnv.com/tos.html)

Thank you, 

ServersNV Team
